page.title: 01HALL FARM
page.content: THE FARM THAT JASON AND I WENT TO WAS 460 ACRES.THE FARM WAS DIVIDED INTO TWO;THEY ARE BOTH DAIRY FARMS,ONE OF 120 ACRES AND THE OTHER 340 ACRES. THE FARM HAS A TOTAL OF 260 DAIRY COWS.MR BABER HAS 320 ACRES OF GRASS AND 40 ACRES OF WHEAT.THE FARM HAS 6 STAFF ALTOGETHER;2 TRACTOR DRIVERS,3 HERDSMEN AND 1 APPRENTICE. ALL THE SURPLUS GRASS IS MADE INTO SILAGE AND HAY.MR BABER HAS 2 SILAGE CLAMPS AND THEY MAKE SILAGE BECAUSE IT IS VERY GOOD FOR THE COWS AND LESS SUSCEPTIBLE TO THE WEATHER.GOOD HAY CAN ONLY BE MADE WHEN THERE IS GOOD WEATHER. THERE IS A MODERN MILKING PARLOUR BUILT ON A HERRING BONE PATTERN.IT CAN HOLD 10 COWS ON EACH SIDE.THEY HAVE AN ENGINE ROOM AS WELL.THEY HAVE COW CUBICLE HOUSES.
